plot: A cosmonaut is alone in a desert planet , 6 days : he is lost and he is hungry. He feels there is maybe something around him , the fog seems to invade him little by little , is there something ? Is there somebody ?
title: Man Is It Good?
plot_es: A cosmonaut is alone in a desert planet , 6 days : he is lost and he is hungry. He feels there is maybe something around him , the fog seems to invade him little by little , is there something ? Is there somebody ?
plot_en: A cosmonaut is alone in a desert planet , 6 days : he is lost and he is hungry. He feels there is maybe something around him , the fog seems to invade him little by little , is there something ? Is there somebody ?
